trans-unit.source: Provides static methods to manipulate bindings, including <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于操作绑定，包括静态方法<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class exposes a set of static methods that serve as helper operations for data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 此类公开一组作为帮助器操作的数据绑定的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a collection by using the synchronization mechanism that the application specified when it called EnableCollectionSynchronization.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的应用程序，它调用 EnableCollectionSynchronization 时的同步机制提供对集合的访问。

trans-unit.source: The collection to access.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的集合。

trans-unit.source: The action to perform on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合上执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if `accessMethod` will write to the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果`accessMethod`将写入到对象; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all bindings, including bindings of type <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>, from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有绑定，包括类型的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> </xref>，从指定<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the specified object is not data-bound, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的对象不是数据绑定，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: The object from which to remove bindings.
trans-unit.target: 要从中删除绑定对象。

trans-unit.source: If target is .
trans-unit.target: If target is .

trans-unit.source: Removes the binding from a property if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，请从属性中删除绑定。

trans-unit.source: If the given property is data-bound with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, this method removes the corresponding binding expression and restores the value of the property to what it was before any local value was set through the binding.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的属性被数据绑定与<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>，此方法中删除相应的绑定表达式和通过绑定设置为其任何本地值之前的属性值的还原。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If the given property is not data-bound, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的属性不是数据绑定，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: The object from which to remove the binding.
trans-unit.target: 要从中删除绑定对象。

trans-unit.source: The dependency property from which to remove the binding.
trans-unit.target: 要从中删除绑定依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: The target and dp parameters cannot be .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the data-binding system notices a collection.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定系统通知集合时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the data-binding system notices a collection view.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定系统通知集合视图时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Remove the synchronization registered for the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 删除注册找不到指定的同步。

trans-unit.source: The collection to remove synchronized access from.
trans-unit.target: 要删除从同步的访问的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that replaces the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext*> when an item container is removed from the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，将替换<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext*>的可视化树中删除项目容器时。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext*>

trans-unit.source: Use this property if you need to deal with the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of an item container.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，如果你需要处理<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>项容器。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An item container is the UI element that displays an item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 项容器是显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>中项的 UI 元素

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is data bound to a collection, an item container is generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>是数据绑定到集合，项目容器为每个项生成。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, item containers are removed from the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，项容器被删除的可视化树中。

trans-unit.source: Two typical cases where an item container is removed are when an item is removed from the underlying collection and when virtualization is enabled on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 删除项目容器的情况的两种典型情况是在从基础集合和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>上启用虚拟化移除某个项

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> property of the item container will be set to the DisconnectedSource property You should check whether the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> is equal to the DisconnectedSource before accessing the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContextChanged> event for item containers.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>项目容器的属性将设置为应检查 DisconnectedSource 属性是否<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>在访问前是否等于 DisconnectedSource<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContextChanged>项容器的事件。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about item containers and virtualization, see the remarks in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关项容器和虚拟化的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>类</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>中的备注部分

trans-unit.source: An object that replaces the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext*> when an item container is removed from the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 替换对象<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext*>的可视化树中删除项目容器时。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext*>

trans-unit.source: Enables a collection to be accessed across multiple threads and specifies the lock object that should be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 启用要跨多个线程进行访问的集合，并指定应可用于同步对集合的访问的锁对象。

trans-unit.source: If you have a lot of data to collect or modify, you might want to use a background thread to collect and modify the data so that the user interface will remain reactive to input.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有大量的数据收集或修改，你可能想要使用后台线程来收集和修改数据，以便用户界面将保持反应输入。

trans-unit.source: To enable multiple threads to access a collection, call the EnableCollectionSynchronization method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用多个线程访问集合，请调用 EnableCollectionSynchronization 方法。

trans-unit.source: When you call this overload of the EnableCollectionSynchronization method, the system locks the collection when you access it.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此重载 EnableCollectionSynchronization 方法时，系统将锁定集合，访问它时。

trans-unit.source: To specify a callback to lock the collection yourself, call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Windows.Data.CollectionSynchronizationCallback%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定回调来自己锁定集合，调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Windows.Data.CollectionSynchronizationCallback%29>重载。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Windows.Data.CollectionSynchronizationCallback%29>

trans-unit.source: The collection that needs synchronized access.
trans-unit.target: 需要集合同步访问。

trans-unit.source: The object to lock when accessing the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要锁定时访问该集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enables a collection to be accessed across multiple threads and specifies the callback that should be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 启用要跨多个线程进行访问的集合，并指定应可用于同步对集合的访问的回调。

trans-unit.source: If you have a lot of data to collect or modify, you might want to use a background thread to collect and modify the data so that the user interface will remain reactive to input.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有大量的数据收集或修改，你可能想要使用后台线程来收集和修改数据，以便用户界面将保持反应输入。

trans-unit.source: To enable multiple threads to access a collection, call the EnableCollectionSynchronization method.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用多个线程访问集合，请调用 EnableCollectionSynchronization 方法。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the EnableCollectionSynchronization method enables you to specify a callback that ensures that the collection is accessed by one thread at a time.
trans-unit.target: EnableCollectionSynchronization 方法的此重载使你可以指定一个回调，以确保一次集合访问由一个线程。

trans-unit.source: You can have the system lock the collection by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Object%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 你可以锁定集合，通过调用系统<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Object%29>重载。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.EnableCollectionSynchronization%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is an arbitrary object that you can use to information known when you enable collection synchronization.
trans-unit.target: `context`参数是一个可用于启用集合同步时的已知信息的任意对象。

trans-unit.source: This is passed to the callback and you can use it to determine the synchronization mechanism to use to control access to `collection`.
trans-unit.target: 这将传递到回调和可用来确定要使用来控制对访问的同步机制`collection`。

trans-unit.source: `Context` can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: `Context`可以是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The collection that needs synchronized access.
trans-unit.target: 需要集合同步访问。

trans-unit.source: An object that is passed to the callback.
trans-unit.target: 一个传递给回调的对象。

trans-unit.source: The callback that is invoked whenever access to the collection is required.
trans-unit.target: 每当需要对集合的访问进行时调用回调。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> object that is set on the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>的指定属性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the binding.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索绑定的绑定目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> object set on the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> object has been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref>给定属性上设置的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>已设置对象。

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: target 和 dp 参数不能为 null。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref> object that is set on the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref>的指定属性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase> class is the common base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>类是公共类的基类<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>类。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBinding%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetPriorityBinding%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetMultiBinding%2A> methods if you know in advance the type of binding that is set on the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBinding%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetPriorityBinding%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetMultiBinding%2A>方法如果您事先知道的它绑定类型的属性上设置。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetMultiBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetPriorityBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索的绑定目标属性<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref> object that is set on the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no binding object has been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"> </xref>的给定属性设置的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有任何绑定对象的设置。

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: The target and dp parameters cannot be .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object associated with the specified binding target property on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>与指定的对象指定的绑定目标属性相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object maintains the connection between the binding source and the binding target.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>对象维护绑定源和绑定目标之间的连接。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object by calling this static method or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> method on a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>对象通过调用此静态方法或通过调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A>数据绑定方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>对象。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: The binding target object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 绑定目标对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索的绑定目标属性<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object associated with the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if none exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref>与给定属性相关联的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不存在。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref> object is set on the property, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression*> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref>对象设置的属性上<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression*>返回。</xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression*>

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: The target and dp parameters cannot be .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object that is set on the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref>的指定属性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase> class is the common base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase>类是公共类的基类<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression>类。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression> </xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetPriorityBindingExpression%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetMultiBindingExpression%2A> methods if you know in advance type of binding that is set on the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetPriorityBindingExpression%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetMultiBindingExpression%2A>方法如果您事先知道的属性上设置的绑定的类型。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetMultiBindingExpression%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetPriorityBindingExpression%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索的绑定目标属性<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object that is set on the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no binding object has been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"> </xref>的给定属性设置的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有任何绑定对象的设置。

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: target 和 dp 参数不能为 null。

trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>的指定属性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the binding.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索绑定的绑定目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> object set on the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> object has been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref>给定属性上设置的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>已设置对象。

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: target 和 dp 参数不能为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> object associated with the specified binding target property on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>与指定的对象指定的绑定目标属性相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression> object associated with the given property or `null` if none exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression>与给定属性相关联的对象或`null`如果不存在。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: The binding target object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 绑定目标对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索的绑定目标属性<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> object associated with the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if none exists.

trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>的指定属性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: The binding target property from which to retrieve the binding.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索绑定的绑定目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> object set on the given property or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> object has been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> </xref>给定属性上设置的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>已设置对象。

trans-unit.source: The target and dp parameters cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: target 和 dp 参数不能为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref> object associated with the specified binding target property on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref>与指定的对象指定的绑定目标属性相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The binding target object where `dp` is.
trans-unit.target: 绑定目标对象其中`dp`是。

trans-unit.source: Gets all <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> objects that have invalid values or target values have not been updated the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>具有无效值或目标值的对象尚未更新源。

trans-unit.source: If `root` is `null`, GetSourceUpdatingBindingGroups returns all <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> objects that are invalid or have not been updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果`root`是`null`，GetSourceUpdatingBindingGroups 返回所有<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>无效或未更新的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> objects that are associated with this element or its descendant elements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>与此元素或其后代元素相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> objects that are associated with the specified element and have invalid values or target values have not been updated the source.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>与指定的元素相关联，并且具有无效的值和目标值的对象尚未更新源。

trans-unit.source: If `root` is `null`, GetSourceUpdatingBindings returns all <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase> objects that are invalid or have not been updated.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified property is currently data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的属性是否是当前的数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase> and associates the instance with the given dependency property of the given object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase>并将实例与给定的对象的给定的依赖项属性关联。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase>

trans-unit.source: This method is the way to attach a binding to an arbitrary <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> that may not expose its own SetBinding method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是将一个绑定附加到一个任意<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>，可能不会公开自己。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: The binding target of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定的绑定目标。

trans-unit.source: The target property of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref> object that describes the binding.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> created for and associated with the specified property.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> class is the base class of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref>.
